slide1.subtext: Welcome to our coffee shop. We hope you enjoy our brand of coffee that we choose for you from all over the world. We wish to make you our regular and happy customerin the near future, so don't forget to try our service once.

slide2.header:
Only The Best Coffee
For You
slide2.subtext: At LPU's House of Coffee, we only brew the freshest coffee globally. We also serve pastries such as cupcakes and brownies. Hope you like our choice and visit again.

about.subtext: We are consistently researching, testing and implementing best practices throughout our business to raise the bar. Making refractometers essential for our cafe brewing. holding advanced sensory learnings for junior roasters, and experimenting with processing at the farm level are just some of the ways that our highly skilled team is constantly evolving the way Indian coffee is treated, experienced or communicated about.

coffee.subtext: Flavour of traditional coffee of royal Rajasthan.

pastries.subtext: Full creamy made of Amul Milk
Special pastrie made of fresh strawberries.

tea.subtext: Tasty tea in Khullad of village.
Nimbu Tea specially for girls to loose weight

customer.text2: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.
Mountains can fly, river can dry, you can forgot me but how can I.
